sentence.Network_en: Mr Cook is intending to go to the Middle East on Friday.
sentence.Network_cn: 库克先生打算周五去中东。

sentence.Network_en: Sofia was intending to call on Miss Kitts.
sentence.Network_cn: 索菲娅打算去拜访基茨小姐。

sentence.Network_en: They are intending to resign from the committee.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们打算辞去委员会中的职务.

list.abs: 谁有初中英语短语、... ... bother to do sth / bother doing sth. 麻烦做某事 intend to do sth / intend doing sth. 想要做某事.
求翻译:我们下周打算去度假是什么意思? 我们下周打算去度假开始翻译参考译文1: We intend to go on vacation next week 参考译文2.
什么是“无缝区域经济”-英语点津 ... 反垄断调查 anti-monopoly probe 预定轨道 intended orbit 基层选举 grassroots election.
I intend a complete ascension in this lifetime ., 我意愿此生完全提升.

entry.def: If you intend to do something, you have decided or planned to do it.

example.ex: She intends to do A levels and go to university...
example.tran: 她计划先参加高级考试，然后去读大学。

example.ex: I didn't intend coming to Germany to work...
example.tran: 我没有打算来德国工作。

entry.tran: 准备,预留(作某种用途或给某人用)
entry.def: If something is intended for a particular purpose, it has been planned to fulfil that purpose. If something is intended for a particular person, it has been planned to be used by that person or to affect them in some way.

example.ex: This money is intended for the development of the tourist industry...
example.tran: 这笔钱准备用于旅游业的开发。

example.ex: Columns are usually intended in architecture to add grandeur and status...
example.tran: 圆柱在建筑中通常用来增添气势和显示地位。

entry.def: If you intend a particular idea or feeling in something that you say or do, you want to express it or want it to be understood.

example.tran: 他没有任何讽刺的意思。

example.ex: Burke's response seemed a little patronizing, though he undoubtedly hadn't intended it that way...
example.tran: 伯克的回答有点施恩与人的感觉,尽管他无疑并没有那个意思。

auth_sentence.content: I promised to attend, fully intending not to.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I promised to attend, fully intending not to.

auth_sentence.content: He was intending to enter the field of aviation.
